comment.p: Calice emulates Capcom CPS-1, CPS-2, Neo-Geo and Sega System 16 games.

revision.comment: Updated kof2001.
Added XORs for dimahoo and gmahoo.
More fixes for people that use fully merged ROM sets.
Included some driver fixes and changed the dat to match (i.e. no ROM name conflicts anymore).
Updated for Calice v0.6.4.
Added a proper CRC for S1 in mslug3n.
Updated for Calice v0.5.4. Used good kof2000 ROMs, added XORs for spf2t and ssf2a.
Updated for Calice v0.5.2.
Used redump of wjammers (s1) from MAME v0.57. Added vampa XORs.
Used redumps of alpham2, kof99p, sonicwi2 and strhoop from MAME v0.56.
Added XORs vsav.
Added XORs for dstlk, mshj and smbomber.
Updated for Calice v0.4.6.
Added 153 games for Calice v0.4.4.
Added XOR details for sfa3.
Updated for Calice v0.3.8.
Updated for Calice v0.3.6.
Added XORs for Street Fighter Zero 2 Alpha.
Added XORs for Armored Warriors.
Added XORs for Street Fighter Zero 2.
Minor changes to allow better merging.
Minor changes for Calice 0.3.2.
Added Street Fighter Zero 3 for Calice 0.3.0, plus a few ROM changes for the new release (sound added).
Added XOR details for Super Street Fighter 2 X.
Uploaded dats for Calice 0.2.9 (Super Puzzle Fighter X added and Super Street Fighter 2 ROMs renamed).
Added new XOR details for D&D: Shadow over Mystara (US).
Added new XOR details for D&D: Tower of Doom (Japan).
Released dats for Calice v0.2.6 (23 CPS-2 games added).
Released dats for Calice v0.2.3 (Super Street Fighter 2 Turbo added).
Released dats for Calice v0.2.2 (various games added).
Released dats for Calice v0.2.0 (20 games added).
Changed the ROMCenter 2 dat slightly (was not being handled as intended).
Added games for v0.1.5 and enabled split sets.
Added lots of Street Fighter 2 variants for v0.1.4.
Added megaman, rockmanj and wof for v0.1.2.
Added 6 games for v0.1.0.
Added 4 games for v0.0.8. Sound ROMs added too.
Added 9 games for v0.0.7.
Added 11 games for v0.0.6.
Initial Release for Calice v0.0.3a.
